text:
Individuals who received the COVID-19 vaccination can get their Vaccination Certificate in a few easy steps through BeAware Bahrain App.

Download the app via https://t.co/7jUroYoI6p

#Bahrain #BeAware #app #vaccine #COVID19 #Coronavirus #Commit4Bahrain
@mohbahrain @schbahrain https://t.co/iCfRBnQSqo
